title: Honoring Lenny Heide upon the occasion of his designation for special recognition
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE  RESOLUTION  honoring  Lenny  Heide upon the occasion of his
designation as Man of the Year by the Merrick  Chamber  of  Commerce  on
January 27, 2011

WHEREAS, It is the practice of this Legislative Body to take note of and
publicly  acknowledge  individuals of remarkable integrity and character
who have inspired and brought pride to our majestic  Empire  State  with
their strong contributions to the community and model citizenship; and
  WHEREAS,  Attendant to such concern, and in full accord with its long-
standing traditions, this Legislative Body  is  justly  proud  to  honor
Lenny  Heide  upon the occasion of his designation as Man of the Year by
the Merrick Chamber of Commerce at its Annual Installation  Dinner  held
on Thursday, January 27, 2011, at the Chateau Briand; and
  WHEREAS, Individuals who give of their time and energies and serve the
best interests of their communities are an asset beyond remuneration and
cannot be sufficiently extolled; and
  WHEREAS,  A  man  of singular distinction, Lenny Heide has continually
demonstrated extreme competence, extraordinary intelligence and diligent
leadership in his unwavering service to his community and profession and
has been designated for this most prestigious award; and
  WHEREAS, Lenny Heide, Chief Custodian at Calhoun  High  School,  works
tirelessly  to  keep  the  school  in  its  best  condition, and takes a
personal interest in many of the students he encounters;  he  loves  the
Merrick  community  and  was recognized for his holiday light display in
2010; and
  WHEREAS, Planning to build a greenhouse  with  life  skills  students,
Lenny  Heide  helps  in  any way he can to improve the lives of those in
need, and demonstrates the ability that everyone has to make  a  differ-
ence;  a  true  asset  to  society, he uses his job as an avenue to help
others; and
  WHEREAS, Throughout the entire period  of  his  community  service,  a
period  of  constructive  involvement, Lenny Heide has stood constant in
dignity, good grace and humor; and
  WHEREAS, Rare indeed is the impressive dedication shown by an individ-
ual for the benefit of others which Lenny Heide has displayed throughout
his life; and
  WHEREAS, It is the sense of this Legislative Body that  when  individ-
uals  of  such  noble aims and accomplishments are brought to our atten-
tion, they should be celebrated and recognized by all  the  citizens  of
the great State of New York; now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED,  That  this  Legislative  Body pause in its deliberations to
honor Lenny Heide upon the occasion of his designation  as  Man  of  the
Year  by  the Merrick Chamber of Commerce on January 27, 2011; and be it
further
  RESOLVED, That a copy of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to Lenny Heide.
